original_text: The Israelites journeyed from Rameses to Sukkoth. There were about six hundred thousand men on foot, besides women and children.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 라암셋을 떠나서 숙곳에 이르니 유아 외에 보행하는 장정이 육십만 가량이요

sentences.original_text: The Israelites journeyed from Rameses to Sukkoth
There were about six hundred thousand men on foot
sentences.korean_translation: 도보로 가는 남자가 육십만 명가량 있었다
